alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 7:08AM EST until February 25 at 7:52PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Sullivan, Hawkins and Scott Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Holston River near Gate City VA. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Caution stage. At 12.0 feet, Water begins to cover some low lying county roads. At 14.0 feet, County Road 614 is cut off 1 1/2 miles downstream from the Highway 23 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM EST Friday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.2 feet early this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM EST.
